method.name: verifyPhoneNumberWithCode
method.comment: Verify Phone number with code received by sms. This function should be used on phone without auto-verification. VerificationId String will be received on _oncodesent event. _phoneverification event will then be raised and in case of success subsequently the _phonesignedin one. Example: authphone.verifyPhoneNumberWithCode(verificationId, et_code.text) Events: _phoneverification(success As Boolean, info As String) _phonesignedin(success As Boolean, User As FirebaseAuthPhoneUser, info As String) Events examples: Sub authphone_phoneverification(success As Boolean, info As String) 'Info may return: ' "Invalid phone number." or "Too many requests." If success = True Then ToastMessageShow("Phone Verification succeded!",True) Else MsgboxAsync("Phone Verification failed!"& CRLF & "info: " & info, "Alert") End If End Sub Sub authphone_phonesignedin(success As Boolean, User As FirebaseAuthPhoneUser, info As String) If success = True Then Log("Phone Signed In, Access granted ") Log ("Uid:" & User.Uid) End If End Sub

method.name: currentToken
method.comment: Get current token. This function should be used to retrieve token ID's token string will returned on _gettoken event. Example: authphone.currentToken() Events: _gettoken(success As Boolean, token as string, info As String) Events examples: Sub authphone_gettoken(success As Boolean, token as string, info As String) If success = True Then ToastMessageShow("get token success!",True) log(token) ' use token with your backend server ' .... Else MsgboxAsync("get token failed!"& CRLF & "info: " & info, "Alert") End If End Sub

method.name: SignOut
method.comment: Signs out from phone number account. Example: authephone.SignOut()

method.name: startPhoneNumberVerification
method.comment: Start phone number verification process in Firebase Phone number account. In most cases phone number will be automatically verified and _phonesignedin event will be raise after _phoneverification one. Example: authphone.startPhoneNumberVerification(et_phoneNumber.Text) Events: _phoneverification(success As Boolean, info As String) _oncodesent(success As Boolean, verificationid As String) _phonesignedin(success As Boolean, User As FirebaseAuthPhoneUser, info As String) Events examples: Sub authphone_phoneverification(success As Boolean, info As String) 'Info may return: ' "Invalid phone number." or "Too many requests." If success = True Then ToastMessageShow("Phone Verification succeded!",True) Else MsgboxAsync("Phone Verification failed!"& CRLF & "info: " & info, "Alert") End If End Sub Sub authphone_oncodesent(success As Boolean, verificationid As String) If success = True Then ' use verification ID and code received to ' verify the phone number in non auto-verifing phone. End if End Sub Sub authphone_phonesignedin(success As Boolean, User As FirebaseAuthPhoneUser, info As String) If success = True Then Log("Phone Signed In, Access granted ") Log ("Uid:" & User.Uid) End If End Sub

method.name: updateProfile
method.comment: Update User profile. This function should be used to modify/update user Diplay Name and Photo Url successful update would be returned on _userupdated event. Example: authephone.updateProfile(displayName as string, photoUrl as string) Events: _userupdated(success As Boolean, info As String) Events examples: Sub authphone_userupdated(success As Boolean,info As String) If success = True Then ToastMessageShow("Profile updated successfully!",True) ' .... Else MsgboxAsync("Profile update failed!"& CRLF & "info: " & info, "Alert") End If End Sub

method.name: deleteUser
method.comment: Delete User. This function should be used to delete user currently connected. successful deletion would be returned on _userdeleted event. Example: authphone.deleteUser() Events: _userdeleted(success As Boolean, info As String) Events examples: Sub authphone_userdeleted(success As Boolean,info As String) If success = True Then ToastMessageShow("User account successfully deleted!",True) ' .... Else MsgboxAsync("User account deletion failed!"& CRLF & "info: " & info, "Alert") End If End Sub
